channel.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
channel.description:
Hi,
I saw a movie on youtube, called [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wvzGR4gYL64]Half-Life: Zombie Edition[/url].
What about a mod based on Black Mesa where we start as a Headcrab on Xen and we are teleported to the Black Mesa Facility, then we need to find a doctor, guard, or anybody else to become a zombie and the goal is too reach a Portal to get back to Xen?
Maybe even the possibility to infect Gordon....
Just an idea, what do u think guys/girls?

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
It’s a good concept, and I’d LOVE to see a multiplayer mode like that; to play as an alien on an enemy force (something like Natural Selection 1/2’s).

For some inexplicable reason I can’t fathom no one’s done that yet with their games. I’d wager it’d get real popular real quick.

Read full topic
item.source: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?

item.description:
Looking at the comments for the alpha of that mod, I think I just wait till Valve unfucked it.

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
item.dc:creator: Streamly
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

He means a mod for Black Mesa, not a total conversion mod.

Oh okay, is see anyway is easiest, you don’t need anycode, if you want i can ask him for make it some maps like you say.

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Streamly:

Maybe this can help you, is a Mod than is making a friend, he was furious when he posted a “demo” and he said is temporaly dead, but is not dead, he is working on it, is modeling and is making animations. Headcrab Mod

For you see examples:

Teaser trailer

Headcrab to zombie alpha

He means a mod for Black Mesa, not a total conversion mod.

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Ronster:

It’s a bit like AVP 2

where you had to face hugger some poor guy in a toilet…

As AvP indeed, more stealthy approach is needed cause u have no weapons u can use, so close counter combat…

Well I played AvP2 in the past, very nice game, but I did prefer using the Predator (finished the game as those character)

Read full topic
item.source: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

The source code is already available AFAIK. JamesKane said in a thread that you have to send him an e-mail if you want it.

I know, but that thread is removed IIRC.
Atleast I couldn’t find it when I needed the the BMS code.
But if you need to send an e-mail, I guess I’ll just try.

Read full topic

item.title: What about a mod where we can play as Zombie?

TehBoxNoob:

Don’t you need the SourceCode to do something like this?

The source code is already available AFAIK. JamesKane said in a thread that you have to send him an e-mail if you want it.
